pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce Group Income as a decentralized basic income system, explaining its purpose, core concepts (contracts, Chelonia, end-to-end encryption), and high-level architecture

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Guide developers through setting up the development environment, running the application, and understanding the basic development workflow

pages.title: Development Setup
pages.purpose: Detailed instructions for setting up the development environment, including Node.js requirements, npm install, Docker setup, and running grunt dev

pages.title: Testing
pages.purpose: Explain how to run unit tests and E2E tests, use Cypress interactive mode, and understand the custom Cypress commands

pages.title: Contributing
pages.purpose: Contribution guidelines, code style requirements, PR process, and the C4.1 contribution model

pages.title: Architecture
pages.purpose: High-level overview of the system architecture, covering frontend, backend, contracts, and how they interact

pages.title: Contracts System
pages.purpose: Explain the Chelonia contract framework, how contracts work, contract state management, and the relationship between Identity, Group, and Chatroom contracts

pages.title: Identity Contracts
pages.purpose: Detail the Identity contract structure, state, actions (signup, login, logout), and how user authentication works

pages.title: Group Contracts
pages.purpose: Explain Group contract structure, state (profiles, settings, proposals, payments), actions (create, join, leave), and group management features

pages.title: Chatroom Contracts
pages.purpose: Document Chatroom contract structure, state (messages, members), actions (send message, join, leave), and how chat rooms integrate with groups

pages.title: Cryptographic Keys
pages.purpose: Explain the hierarchical key system (IPK, IEK, CSK, CEK, PEK, DMK, SAK), key rings, transient vs. persistent keys, and key sharing via OP_KEY_REQUEST/OP_KEY_SHARE

pages.title: Frontend Architecture
pages.purpose: Overview of the Vue.js frontend, Vuex store, router, SBP service bus, component structure, and how the UI interacts with contracts

pages.title: Backend Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the Hapi.js server, HTTP API routes, WebSocket Pub/Sub, persistence layer (FS and SQLite backends), and data synchronization

pages.title: Service Worker
pages.purpose: Document the service worker architecture, offline functionality, push notifications, background sync, and how Chelonia runs in the SW context

pages.title: Selector-based Programming
pages.purpose: Explain Selector-based Programming (SBP), how it enables communication between components, action namespaces (gi.actions/*, chelonia/*, okTurtles.events/*), and the RPC pattern

pages.title: Core Features
pages.purpose: Overview of the main user-facing features: groups, payments, proposals, and chat

pages.title: Groups
pages.purpose: Document group creation, joining groups, member management, and group settings

pages.title: Creating Groups
pages.purpose: Step-by-step guide to creating a group, including GroupCreationModal, setting mincome, choosing voting rules, and generating initial invite

pages.title: Joining Groups
pages.purpose: Explain the invitation system, Join.vue page, invite validation, key request/share flow, and pending approval process

pages.title: Invitations
pages.purpose: Detail invitation creation, invitation links, expiry, quantity limits, revoking invites, and the InvitationsTable component

pages.title: Payments and Contributions
pages.purpose: Overview of the payment system, income details, pledges, payment periods, and distribution calculations

pages.title: Income Details
pages.purpose: Explain the IncomeDetails modal, declaring income vs. pledges, payment methods, non-monetary contributions, and the ContributionsWidget

pages.title: Payment Periods and Distribution
pages.purpose: Document payment period lifecycle, distribution calculation, haveNeedsSnapshot, distribution locking, and period transitions

pages.title: Recording Payments
pages.purpose: Explain the payment recording flow, RecordPayment modal, payment states (Todo, Pending, Completed, Not Received), and thank you notes

pages.title: Proposals and Voting
pages.purpose: Document the proposal system, voting rules (percentage, disagreement), proposal types, and the governance workflow

pages.title: Proposal Types
pages.purpose: Detail each proposal type: PROPOSAL_INVITE_MEMBER, PROPOSAL_REMOVE_MEMBER, PROPOSAL_GROUP_SETTING_CHANGE, PROPOSAL_PROPOSAL_SETTING_CHANGE, PROPOSAL_GENERIC

pages.title: Voting Rules
pages.purpose: Explain RULE_PERCENTAGE and RULE_DISAGREEMENT, how votes are counted, and when proposals pass or fail

pages.title: Chat System
pages.purpose: Overview of the chat system, channels, direct messages, message types, and real-time communication

pages.title: Sending Messages
pages.purpose: Document the SendArea component, message composition, mentions (@username, #channel), markdown formatting, and typing indicators

pages.title: Message Display and Actions
pages.purpose: Explain MessageBase, message rendering, actions (edit, reply, delete, pin, react), and the MessageActions menu
